purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for enabling the characterization and classification of activity methods.

inscope.li: the specification of the definitions needed to assign management resource information to an activity method or a class of activity methods;
the specification of the definitions needed to classify activity method;
the classification of an activity method.

outscope.li: the definition of classifications of activity

uof.name: Activity_Method_Characterized
uof.description: The Activity_Method_Characterized UoF specifies the data structure for the representation of characterized activity method data.
